products.title: Parisian Life Style Private Photo Shoot at Eiffel Tower
products.description:
Visiting Paris? 

Time to live the dream! 

Walk around the city with a local professional photographer and take home the best images of your amazing trip. In a 100% Parisian life style photo shooting, get to know Paris' highlights and secrets and keep your memories forever. 
 • 1h photo shooting with local professional photographer 
 • 50-80 high resolution EDITED photos sent by mail after the shooting 
 • groups up to ten people! 
 • Ideal for celebrating your honeymoon, engagement photos, bachelor party, family trip, birthdays and more 
 • props included for kids 
 • kids friendly activity 
 • fun, local and 100% passionate photographers!

NOTE: you will be booked in the first available hour. You will receive an email about your tour hour, meeting point and recognizing your photographer within 7 days of booking. Please check your spam and contact with us if you have not received it.

products.title: Paris in a Day - Private Experience
products.description: Explore the atmospheric neighborhoods of Paris like a local on this private custom-made tour that cleverly combines pleasurable walking moments into the historic neighborhoods with the use of private (taxi) and public (metro/bus) transportation when needed. Accompanied by your guide, enjoy walking Latin Quarter and other typical Parisian neighborhoods praised by the locals, admire landmarks like Notre-Dame, Arc de Triomphe, Louvre, Pantheon, Invalides. Discover Paris neighborhoods where you'll stroll the Luxembourg Gardens and lesser known highlights on the way. Get to navigate like a true Parisian and learn to easily and safely use Paris Metro. Receive tips on what to see and do in Paris from a local guide. Private tour ensures a completely customized experience Hassle-free pickup and drop-off at your hotel within Paris city limits. NO pick up at hotels near Paris airports (CDG, Orly, Beauvais). It's like going with your friend who knows a lot about it and wants to share it with you.

images.caption: Eating homemade ice cream in Paris

products.title: Semi-Private Louvre Masterpieces with Reserved Entrance Time
products.description: With a maximum of six people per group, you are guaranteed a nearly private experience! Whether it is your first or one hundredth visit to the Louvre, there is something for everyone on this exclusive tour.  Your expert guide will lead you through the museum as you visit the Louvre’s must-sees.  Marvel at masterpieces in the Louvre’s most significant collections from Mesopotamia to French Romanticism, including, of course, the Mona Lisa, the Venus de Milo, and Winged Victory.

products.title: Parcours Bois de Vincennes - Segway Tour of Paris
products.description:
This 2.5 hour tour will take you through one of the capital's two lungs. On the menu: greening and gliding sensations!
Stroll along the trails of the Bois de Vincennes, discover Land Art and the peaceful Lakes of Daumesnil and Minimes.
Breaks are planned: The Great Pagoda and the Romantic Temple of Reuilly Island.
Strong points: The “Segway cross”, the Land Art, the Daumesnil lake and the surprising Tropical Garden.

products.title: Great Women of History walking tour
products.description: Join the first Paris walking tour devoted entirely to women's history and influence. Meet near the Pantheon and take an inspirational 3-hour guided walk through the charming streets of the famous Left Bank, unraveling stories of incredible women at every turn.

products.title: Montmartre/Sacre-Coeur/Paris- Artistic & Bohemian Epicenter
products.description:
You will follow a highly attractive itinerary including history and stories, architecture, street art, local food stores, artists at work in the lively Place de Tertre, walking in the calm cobbled old streets uphill to reach the imposing Basilica of Sacre – Coeur, with a breathtaking panorama view upon the city of Paris.

Your walking tour covers must-see spot as well as hidden treasures of Montmartre Village, walking in the footsteps of the impressionist artists who were inspired by local sites. You see film shot spots of famous French ‘ Amelie of Montmartre’ and many more. You feel the vibes of the hip , artsy and historical Montmartre Village and its eclectic sites. Your tour is tailored to your interests and physical abilities 
 Note : private/ personalized tours possible on request- number of participants- unlimited
 Note: students & group of friends & team- building, special event in a group tours possible on request- number of participants- unlimited

products.title: Photographer in Paris
products.description: Hi! I m Nina :) 10 years of experience in photography and same living in Paris - great mix for an excellent photoshooting quality. And a bit of humor and love for meeting new people. I would be glad to meet your for a photo promenade :)

products.title: Private Historical Photo Tour in Paris
products.description:
During the Paris Portrait Tour, I will show you arround the city of Paris, in a 1 hour and 40 min Historical tour in the center of Paris from Concorde to Saint Michel. 

I am a professional Photographer for severl years and I work a lot with tourists, fashion, hôtels, models and events. 

I will show you some of paris most beautifull monuments and sight. 

I will be able to give you many explanations about the monuments and the Parisian History linked to all these places. 

This area that we will be visiting is where the City of Paris was created, it is the heart of the city. 

During this walk, I will also be able to shoot pictures of you (and family/friends) with my DSLR camera, as I am a Photogrpaher. 

Once the experience will be over, I will edit the pictures (20 pictures-30 pictures for families) and send you them the following days (7 days maximum).

It is possible to change the starting and ending time, let me know.

Max Rumeau Photography

products.title: Literary Women and Sweet Tastings walking tour
products.description:
The first Paris walking tours devoted to women’s history and influence, Women of Paris offers tours that challenge the status quo by placing women at the heart of the Paris story. Since launching in 2016, Women of Paris has received lots of coverage in the French and international media and very positive reviews. 

This unique experience combines an exploration into women’s imprint on the literary world, as well as a bit of sugar and spice! We'll take a stroll through Saint Germain-des-Prés walking in the footsteps of female writers, examining the development of the Women's Liberation Movement in France and making 4 stops along the way to taste and learn about a selection of award winning French sweets and cakes. 

After all, it wouldn't be Paris without something delicious to eat..!

products.title: Scandals: Louvre (Semi-Private) With Reserved Entrance Time
products.description: With a maximum of six people per group, you are guaranteed a nearly private experience! This tour aims to answer the questions that a typical tour would not. Have you ever wondered why Greek and Roman sculptures are so poorly endowed or what really made the Mona Lisa so famous? Art has always pushed the boundaries of society and artists are often inspired by sex, scandals, and the tumultuous relationships that surround them.  No topic is off-limits and questions you may have been perhaps too polite to ask will be answered. With such a vast collection of art work at the Louvre there is bound to be a scandal or two! Please note, this tour is for people eighteen or older. Please contact us if you would like us to make an exception.

products.title: Private ride in a Citroën 2CV in Paris - 2h
products.description:
We offer tours of Paris in the legendary Citroën 2CV. Convertible, cute and funny, it attracts attention and sympathy while allowing you to admire Paris in all its splendor, with its convertible roof.
Accompanied by old French music such as Edith Piaf, Fréhel, you will experience a step back in time. All this for an unusual experience. We will walk through the small secret alleys of Paris, steeped in history and charm. Every nook, place, sidewalk dotted with streetlamps, for a feast for the eyes. It is a way to compress time by seeing a lot of things in 2 hours, and to feel a particular emotion, like in a movie. You are the main character. Are you ready? Let's go. Beep beep!!! Whether it is imitating Emily in Paris while eating at Maison Rose, having a hot chocolate to meet Hemingway at Café de Flore or at Midnight in Paris, you will have many opportunities to feel yourself in a movie.

products.title: Private photo session in Paris
products.description: A short circuit but rather rich because it allows you to see the Eiffel Tower from a different point of view. This experience offers a short walk accompanied by a professional photographer to immortalize this dream moment

products.title: The Pere Lachaise Cemetery Private Tour
products.description:
The Pere Lachaise is a surprising open-air museum of 70,000 graves, 44 hectares and 5,300 trees. 

Avoid the noisy big groups and chose to live this experience in a more intimate way. Chat and get to know more, the guide will reveal you the secrets and the legends of the past and present. The tour can be just for you alone, for your couple, for your family or for your group of friends. And all the special requests will be fulfilled. 

Many are the celebrities buried here, local and international. Jim Morrison, Oscar Wilde, Isadora Duncan, Gertrude Stein, Maria Callas, Marcel Proust, Chopin, Moliere, Delacroix, Piaf, Marceau and so many others that often visitors miss. Our guide knows how to find them all and put them in a thread, using shortcuts off the beaten paths and will let you discover unusual spots of landscaped beauty.

The tour is about 2 hours, but it's you who decide everything, it's your private tour!

products.title: Explore Paris in Half a Day: Custom Tour with Local Expert Guide!
products.description:
Discover the best of Paris with a local guide who knows the city inside and out on this customizable tour. This tour is a perfect way to see the must-sees of Paris and also grasp the local culture.

Your guide is a local who will give you the unique perspective of a true Parisian, with an in-depth knowledge of the city's history and personal experiences of different neighborhoods. He has lived, studied, and worked in various areas and will share his personal insights and hidden gems with you.

We understand that every traveler has different interests and priorities, so once you book this tour, we will contact you to discuss what you want to see and do and craft the perfect itinerary that suits your preferences.

The sample itinerary shows what someone interested in a walking tour of the left bank could do during this tour.

images.caption: Notre-Dame and Latin Quarter Private Tour

products.title: Paris 2-Hour Eiffel Tower Walking Tour with Professional Photo Shoot
products.description:
What makes this tour unique is the excellent quality of the 300 pictures that are being taken. In different locations and backgrounds. Also the fact that all these pictures will be delivered retouched in terms of their exposure, saturation, sharpness, incorrections etc. and ready for immediate printing. The sending of the pictures is being made within 24 hours. But what mostly makes this session unique, is the wonderful smile, the warmth, the politeness, the humour and the patience of our experienced photographer Ari Bafalouka that speaks perfectly well English and French. 

No need to worry about snapping the perfect selfie in front of the Eiffel Tower when you can instead book a walking tour that includes a photo shoot by a professional photographer. During this 2-hour Paris experience, you'll explore the area around the Eiffel Tower while the photographer captures 300 artistic photos of you in front of the world-famous landmark. Retouching for all the pictures is included.

products.title: Photography workshop in Paris
products.description:
The City of Light has many secrets, sometimes unknown to locals. Discover the intimacy of neighborhoods in a city on the move where you won't know where to turn! These three hours of session will allow you to learn new photography techniques, encourage your creativity and develop your technical skills in order to be sure to capture the shot you so desire.

Whether you are a beginner, a seasoned amateur or have several years of experience, our team of professional photographers will allow you to take your photography skills to the next level. Our condensed sessions are unique and customizable to your interests and help develop your creative vision.

products.title: Food tour Belleville Off the Beaten Path 10:30 am
products.description:
Did you know that the selection of addresses for our Food tour is carefully prepared over several months?
- Meeting with producers/artisans
- Visit of the production workshops
Belleville is in the heart of the artistic village with a bohemian spirit..
Starting at the Jourdain church, this guided tour by an expert in French gastronomy will begin with a culinary discovery , at the highest point of Paris.
For three hours, meet passionate local artisans, the best in their field, and taste bread and croissant, iconic Parisian travel cake, chocolates, coffee, salame or oysters. 
On your way, settle down in a bistro for a cheese and wine pairing.Visit a baker's kitchen ( according to the sanitary rules in force) Learn how to make a baguette and a real butter croissant. 
Many anecdotes will be told to you as well as our French gastronomic exception. Paris A Dream is a local company that has only one desire: to promote our French know-how and provide you with unforgettable experiences.

products.title: Portrait photoshoot in Paris by Pro photographer
products.description: Enjoy a different photo session by a photographer with professional equipment and 10+ years of experience. No matter if you are a fashion model, a couple, a family, or someone who never posed, the photographer will capture the best version of yourself! You can adapt the shooting to your style, location, or just trust us! The meeting time is flexible. After the booking and according to your schedule, we will guide you to the best spot and time in order to avoid crowds and have the best light during the photoshoot. After the photoshoot you will get a private digital album from which you will be able to download a maximum of 50 edited high quality photos.

products.title: Explore Paris Like a Local: Customized Full-Day Tour with Personal Guide!
products.description:
Visit Paris like you want to! Whether you're a food lover, fashion enthusiast, or history buff, we'll tailor an itinerary that perfectly suits your interests.

We are Walid and Clara, two passionate Parisians who want to help you make the most of your time in Paris. During this full-day tour, we'll introduce you to the local culture and ensure you don't miss some of the must-sees. We'll share with you our hidden gems and our favorite restaurants. 

Whether it's your first visit or you're returning for more, we will show you the must-see sights and offer plenty of suggestions for things to do.

- No fixed itinerary; we create it together over the phone
- A private guide with you the whole day
- Meet up in your hotel lobby
- Walking tour with public transportation

The itinerary is an example of a tour tailored for someone interested mainly in the history of the Left Bank but still wants to discover other sights.

products.title: Private Louvre Museum Tour for Kids & Families with Alberto or his team in Paris
products.description:
The biggest Art museum in the world is a must during your trip to Paris – especially if you have a family with kids. Alberto is a very experienced guide, kids love him, his fun attitude and coolness and the way he knows how to tell them stories, how to break down the facts about the artwork to their level and captivate their interest in every word he says. He chose a small team of local guides with the same passion as he has and one of them will be your guide.

Taking this 2-hr tour you will all get the best experience at the Louvre

Adults can lean back and let Alberto or one of his fantastic team guide them through this enormous building, but they will also learn a lot of new and interesting facts about each and every piece of art they see. You will never forget this amazing tour with Alberto's team and you will wonder at how enthusiastic your kids can be about an Art Museum!

products.title: Workshop de perfectionnement
products.description:
Aperture Tour offre des workshop condensés, pour des niveaux allant de développement à perfectionnement technique.

Vous voulez améliorer le côté technique de votre photographie ? Ces workshops sont conçus pour vous apprendre l'essentiel. Nos thématiques couvrent tous les niveaux, allant de "L'introduction à la photographie pour les débutants" à des sujets plus complexes tels que "L’utilisation pertinente du Flash" ou le "Light Painting". La compréhension du fonctionnement de votre appareil photo est la clé pour découvrir ses capacités et enfin libérer votre créativité.

Que vous soyez débutant, amateur éclairé ou que vous ayez plusieurs années d'expérience, notre équipe de photographes professionnels va vous permettre d’élever vos compétences de photographie au niveau supérieur. Nos workshop sont uniques et personnalisables en fonction de vos intérêts et permettent de développer votre vision créative.

products.title: Montmartre Tour Paris
products.description: Scale the heights of Paris in Montmartre, 500 feet above the city, with breathtaking panoramic views. Discover the gems of this former little village originally outside of Paris: the beautiful Sacre Coeur church with its marble Byzantine-style domes, the former artist colony and studios where Picasso, Toulouse Lautrec, Van Gogh and Degas painted their masterpieces, the ancient windmills, the still operating vineyard that produces an annual wine, and a walk on one of the best gourmet food shop streets in Paris.

products.title: Book your Amazing Photo Shoot in Paris
Historical Outdoor Escape Game in Paris: The Stone of Nicolas Flamel
products.description:
A mix between a treasure hunt, a historical excursion and an escape game, you are invited to an immersive trip in the heart of Paris !

Equipped with handbags containing mysterious objects, antique maps and enigmatic drawings, you will explore the city and its history, solving ancient mysteries.

A new way to discover Paris, its secret history and places.

You'll leave having discovered some hidden gems of Paris and stories about the city, having had lots of fun in the process !

products.title: Personalized Photo Shoot in Paris
products.description:
My background in art history and experience working in the fashion industry in Paris has immensely shaped and trained my artistic eye in the realm of photography. For this reason, a photo of my clients in a Parisian environment is not enough - I always search for a beautifully framed image, that perfect light, and most importantly, those natural moments you share. 

This is your special time in the most beautiful city in the world - you deserve to create memories in a location that inspires you! I will design our shoot according to your desires, and if you don't know your preferences yet, you can leave the magic to me :)

products.title: Discovery of Montmartre in a 2CV - 45 min
products.description:
Original experience for exploring Paris in 45min

Pick up and drop off from any place in the center of Paris

products.title: Stroll a Local French market & have a picnic
products.description:
This perfect food lovers activity has been picked to be featured on NBC Today Show with Hoda & Jenna. Segment hosted by Donna Farizan.
Paris is known as a major gastronomical dream destination and French markets are the perfect place to begin. So, come along for an informative stroll at a lively, colorful and true local outdoor market. You'll indulge your senses with an abundance of aromas, of colors while sharpening your taste buds with local delights.

You'll learn informally all about this exciting aspect of our French lifestyle. With the help of your knowledgeable and personable guide, you'll use easy French key sentences to easily interact with vendors and feel like a Parisian for the day. A convivial French picnic with wine and our selection from the market will follow at a nearby peaceful park. The perfect reward to sprinkle up your Parisian journey. Joyfully Yours !

products.title: Explore Montmartre like a local - Private walking tour
products.description:
• Walk in the steps of world class painters like Monet, Picasso or Van Gogh 
• Revive parties at the Moulin Rouge with Toulouse-Lautrec and Cancan dancers
• Explore the picturesque back-alleys of a village lost in the capital city 
• Discover the Bobos’ way of life, so uniquely Parisian and amazing food stores 
• Admire Sacre Coeur Basilica ( Sacred-Heart)  and Paris’ most stunning city view

products.title: Paris Secret 2CV tour - 3H
products.description:
This visit in 2CV of 3h is ideal to discover the city and discover the great Parisian monuments but also unsuspected neighborhoods secret places including Parisians themselves.

During the visit, you will benefit from anecdotes of guide drivers who meet all your expectations.

Very beautiful photos are taken during the visit to immortalize this moment.

products.title: Parisian-Asian Dinner by a MasterChef Winner in Marais
products.description:
Let Jean-Yves, a French Masterchef winner, take you on a culinary journey from France to Asia during his four course dinner. He'll be sharing the stories and secrets behind all the dishes. You'll be able to discover how each ingredient has been carefully chosen to create the best harmony of taste, colors, and smells.

• French-Asian fusion menu, a subtle combination of French techniques and Asian flavors
• 1 communal table of up to 12 guests
• In a former wine cellar near the Marais
• Tripadvisor certificate of excellence

products.title: Paris Orsay Museum Private Tour for Kids with Tickets included
products.description: Fall in love with the masterpieces of the Impressionism art movement on this exclusive family tour  with a top rated guide specialised in working with kids! Both parents and children will have fun while hearing fascinating stories and discovering surprising facts about life and works of some of the world's best modern artists. You will take a close look to famous works by Monet, Renoir, Manet, Van Gogh and many more. You will learn and enjoy playing educational games and activities especially designed for this private tour, tailored on your family!

products.title: Paris Street Art bike tour - Open Air Museum
products.description:
Paris created the world largest Street Art open-air museum.
Join us for a fun bike ride along the river from Paris center to Paris most modern neighborhood, ZAC Paris 13 where the greatest architects let loose and created delirious buildings and where star graffiti artists from all over the world met to create giant murals.
Tristan Eaton, Invader, Faile, Btoy, D * Face, Shepard Fairey, Cryptik, Hush, Conor Harrington, INTI and many others are waiting for you ... Banksy maybe !
Frescoes of 10, 20, 30 or even 40 m high with all styles colliding.
We will enjoy a coffee break in the world largest start-up incubator, Station F where Big Mama group created its flagship vessel of 10 themed restaurants in an incredible atmosphere! Here young people from around the world are shaping the world of tomorrow!
See you soon !

products.title: Paris by Night 1h Tour in Vintage French Car
products.description:
With Classic 60's Paris Tours, dive into the 60's for an unforgettable visit of Paris ! See Paris in style by traveling through the city in a vintage open-top Citroën DS. 

In the company of just your party and your local guide, imagine you've traveled back in time as you soak up the sights of the Champs-Elysées, Eiffel Tower, Louvre museum, and more ! You can hop into the car after easy pickup and let your knowledgeable guide you through the City of Light, offering helpful narration as you go. 

- Get your guide's attention on a personalized outing, with up to four guests

- Great value for money: Four people can fit in the car in a very comfortable seats. 

- Get insights and local tips from your local guide.

- Learn all about the city and its landmarks from your guide

- See the city in style and with class in a vintage luxury and comfortable french car.

products.title: Latin Quarter Private Walking Tour
products.description:
This 2-hour private walking tour focuses specifically on the Latin Quarter, one of the oldest area in Paris. You will of course discover some famous landmarks such as Pantheon or Jardin du Luxembourg, but also some less touristy parts of this amazing neighborhood such as Collège des Bernardins or Arènes de Lutèce.

Your guide is a native Parisian, speaking fluent English, who is willing to show and explain you what makes this area so nice. The quality of service is very important to us, we want you to feel the most comfortable possible with us, and our guide will behave with you as your Parisian best friend.

You will be able to ask all the questions you have as it is a private tour, dedicated to your group only. This service is perfect to discover the Latin Quarter as an insider!

products.title: Vintage Private Tour: Sidecar Motorcycle Ural Paris (1hr30)
products.description:
Take an open-air journey in the City of Light on a retro-style tour by vintage motorcycle sidecar. Designed for those looking for a different sightseeing experience, this authentic guided tour of Paris allows you to (re)discover the city in a romantic and unusual way. See cultural or heritage sights, and drive along little-known streets while listening to anecdotes from a driver-guide. 
2 passengers on the vehicle, 1 comfy in the sidecar 1 funny behind the pilot (possibility to switch)

images.caption: Secret Streets in St Germain Des Pres by Sidecar

products.title: Paris Street Art, smartphone audioguided tour
products.description:
Discover magnificent frescoes from world famous artists, on your smartphone with a guide in your pocket! Now possible thanks to Rewind's App.

Paris, street art capital of the world? No doubt ! Walk through an open air museum and discover magnificent frescoes from world famous artists!

The 13th district of Paris is full of street art frescoes, each more impressive than the next. D*Face, C215, Obey or Invader...This tour is a beautiful introduction to street art, highlighting both the artists and their works, and its paradoxes in the open-air museum of Paris. The visit also helps understand why street art took root in the 13th arrondissement as well as the economic model behind it!

Visit with your smartphone in your pocket and follow your professional and passionate guide’s commentaries as you stroll through the streets and squares, by the way he happens to run a café in Montmartre !. The audio commentaries trigger automatically, right where they happened!” The result? A fun and authentic experience with that Rewind spirit and twist !

A short stop at a terrace or a shop, a small craving? Resume the visit when you want, right where you paused. Impossible to get lost. The guide provides clear audio directions and a map indicates clear directions to follow in real time. And if you take a wrong turn, the integrated geo-localization feature will get you back on track in no time! customize your itinerary as you wish, relax and enjoy a fun and authentic Street Art walking tour, at your own pace.

products.title: Experience Segway in Paris Small Group 2 Hours
products.description:
Enjoy a beautiful hassle free experience around Paris with a local guide on a Segway! Have a private tour in the city with rich history at any time you want with your friends and family in a small group of only 8 people!

Discover Paris at a faster pace than a walking tour, and save tired legs, by choosing this fun option. Glide down the river bank, stop for photo opportunities of the Eiffel Tower, and the Louvre, and enjoy lots of entertaining commentary along the way. Ask our local guide for some tips in Paris after this ride so your adventure would continue!

products.title: WW1 Belleau Wood and American Monument in Château-Thierry - Day trip from Paris
products.description:
• Walk along belleau wood and relive by yourself the fierce fightings who took place there, involving the US Marines against german soldiers
• Pay tribute to the fallen US soldiers in visiting the beautiful maintained Aisne-Marne American Cemetery
• Discover the monumental and impressive American Monument who stands above Hill 204 and overlooks the town on Château Thierry
• Browse thousands of war-related artifacts at the Museum of the Great War in Meaux

products.title: Pompidou Museum Paris 2-Hour Private Guided Tour
products.description: Discover the world’s largest collection of contemporary art on a 2-hour tour of the Pompidou Centre in central Paris. Skip the long lines to navigate the diverse styles and expressions of artists such as Pollock, Picasso, Dix, Duchamp, and more.

products.title: Private Tour 2CV Paris Secret 2H with Champagne
products.description: We have worked in the tourism sector for several years, and all share a crazy love for the most beautiful city in the world, Paris, as well as 2CVs.

products.title: Paris Private Panoramic Car Tour with a local
products.description:
Perfect tour if you have a short stay so you will have a complete overview of the city. We'll be going to all the most famous and beautiful monuments in Paris.
Ideal tour if you arrive in the morning for exploring the city with us instead of waiting for your check-in at the hotel, especially since we pick you up from the airport.
We make sure that's a memorable experience in our beautiful city with us!

products.title: Montmartre Cheese and Wine Twilight Tour
products.description:
We take wines many think they know and give them a fresh taste introducing them to what they do not know. Beaujolais is much more than the celebrated Juice in November and the best of Bordeaux rarely leaves France. 

This will be an unforgettable evening and is a great excursion for small corporate events and meetings.

products.title: Small Group Tour - Paris Sweet Tooth Stroll
products.description:
You will visit small artisanal shops that the locals know and love for tastings of their specialty items, including seasonal specialties. Step back in time and sample a delicious pain au chocolate from a viennoiserie shop, founded in 1928 and hasn't changed since. Visit the boutique of the inventor of salted butter caramel and sample some of his melt-in-your-mouth creations, stop in at a fine food shop for candies and sweet spreads from Provence and finish with a delectable chocolate from one of the most famous chocolate-making families in France.

Your sweet tooth will be more than satiated after tasting caramels from the originator of salted butter caramels, to homemade viennoiseries, chocolate, and candies from Provence.

products.title: Saint Germain Des Pres Walking Tour
products.description:
Saint Germain des Prés is responsible for the sophisticated image of Paris as a city of art, literature and culture. This charming neighborhood offers a glimpse into authentic Parisian life as you explore its popular attractions with a local guide.

You'll visit iconic landmarks such as the oldest cafe in Paris, opened in 1672, as well as the oldest church. You will also discover some of the city's first jazz clubs, chocolate shops, and restaurants.

As you walk down the chic Boulevard Saint Germain, you will see the place where medieval fairs and marketplaces were once organized. You'll also discover how this neighborhood became a hub for artists and writers like Picasso and Hemingway and existentialists like Sartre and De Beauvoir.

During the tour, you will have the opportunity to visit one of France's six national theaters and one of Paris's largest churches, which played a prominent role in the popular novel and film, "The Da Vinci Code."

products.title: Paris Scavenger Hunt and City Highlights Walking Tour
products.description:
Discover Paris from a different perspective on a self-guided walking tour and scavenger hunt of the city. Solve riddles and clues that lead to the next location, showing all the city highlights.

- Solve interesting puzzles, have fun and learn new things about Paris
- Explore the city and find hidden gems at your own pace
- Try a new type of experience with your smartphone, the perfect mix between a walking tour, sightseeing, and a scavenger hunt.
- Enjoy the tour in English, French

products.title: 1h30 - Louvre Highlights for families with children - English - Español
products.description: This tour allows you to cover the main highlights of the Louvre accompanied by an expert licensed tour guide in only 1.5 hour tour aiming to better understand the arts and the artists and how art history evolved from antiquity to the 19th century To fully enjoy it and maximize your time, your guide will make you discover the five top masterpieces including Mona Lisa, Victory of Samothrace and the oldest artwork in order to keep a memorable tour.
